Summary: i have seen three different things and three different times.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sussex
There were no other sightings in Sussex on or around July 25th 2012
divs: sighting detailsfirst off, i have seen three things three different times, and none have been the same thing. i have decided to come out about this event because i know when the date was and the exact time i seen this "ufo" 1. i was walking home from a long day out on the town with my boyfriend. 2. i am always watching the skies, hoping for a glance at something spectacular... 3. the first thing i thought it was was a meteor crashing to earth. 4.the object i seen was a large fireball in the sky. it was streaking across and it left a long firey tail. there was no smoke and also there was not a sound. 5. my feelings were that i was amazed yet i was terrified. i was waiting for a sonic boom which never happened, 6. i lost sight of the object because it went over top of the tree line. please note that after this fireball left that there was something hovering or slowly flying in or around the same area that we seen the fireball.. and that was 10 minutes after we seen the fireball. ============================================================================ another occasion, there are 4 witnesses.. and each and everyone of them can tell u the same thing, we were all outside watching the skies.. when we noticed something very high in the sky go really fast ... just stop for a few seconds in mid air... it got bright and then boom it was gone. i still have no idea what it coulda been ============================================================================= the last thing that i have witnessed and still unnerves me to this day... i was sleeping in my sister living room on the couch with my boyfriend. and i woke up really early in the morning around 2:00 am, i know it was in the summer time.. anyways, i woke up because the 2 dogs my sister owned were barking nonstop. and noone seemed to notice... i went to the top of the stairs to tell the dogs to stop barking when i noticed a strange, very bright light beaming in the living room from the road. (my dad lives across the road and he does have a motion sensor light out front but i can tell that light from what i seen) anyways, when i went to get a closer look... the light that i seen just went out. and that was it. i had the most unnerving feeling and i still do... because i know i went back to sleep and i woke up kater on that morning... but i dont remember when or how i went back to bed...also... it scares me because noone else seemed to hear these dogs barking... they all think im crazy :\ i am not saying i was abducted or anything but i do find something really off about this event.
